content: the 3x1 hood is a balaclava knit from the top down with an i-cord drawstring gauge 29 sts x 34 row = 4 x 4 in in 3x1 rib yarn approximately 300-400 yards heavy fingering/sport weight yarn needles 2 75mm for main hood and i-cord 2 25mm for drawstring tube measurements 8 5 in deep 10 in face opening length 13 in total length techniques increases picking up stitches vertical buttonholes i-cord note this pattern has not been tech edited or tested--please reach out here or on instagram @sophia knit if you find things are inconsistent or confusing
